import React from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import VideoPosts from './VideoPosts' import ImagePosts from './ImagePosts' const CreatePostForm = ({ currentUser, post }) => { const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({ title: "", text: "", img_url: "", video_url: "", caption: "" }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormValues({ ...formValues, [e.target.id]: e.target.value }) } return (

Image

Video

Written

{formValues.caption}

{formValues.caption}

{formValues.text}

) } export default CreatePostForm
